Confectionary-Docs
Table of Contents

Overview

Unity uses Scenes, which are similar to pages within a website. Since they are implemented within the Unity editor, they're not covered by DocFX. Here's a brief summary of our scenes:

Main Menu:

A simple main menu to connect the game, level editor, and settings. Uses Unity's built-in UI components to render buttons, behavior is handled by our Menu script.

Editor:

Allows users to build levels, placing tiles and enemies. They can then upload these levels to our backend, where they can be played by other players.

Game:

The core gameplay loop, where players fight enemies and progress.
